text:
="preserve">Dodie Stevens (born Geraldine Ann Pasquale; February 17, 1946) is an American pop and rock singer. She's best known for her 1959 song "Pink Shoe Laces". It began at #96 on the United States "Billboard" Hot 100. It peaked at #3 on the chart.
Other Stevens songs are "Merry, Merry Christmas Baby."
Stevens was born in Chicago, Illinois. She and her family moved to the San Gabriel Valley in California when she was a child.
